title: Side chair
text: This rococo chair formed part of a suite of furniture that included twelve side chairs, four armchairs, and a settee, one of which is in the Museu Nacional de Arte Antiga in Lisbon, Portugal.  The chair in Lisbon retains its original tooled leather seat.
description: Splat back is crested with a stylized shell motif below floral motifs. The front rail is carved with scrolls and floral motifs. Four cabriole legs, \'H\' shaped stretcher.
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
